Woman who died climbing Mt Ruapehu was young Auckland uni scientist, Wednesday Davis https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-who-died-climbing-mt-ruapehu-was-young-auckland-uni-scientist-wednesday-davis/6SFDKIDVUNB3ZKFZ72FLQKEAHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-who-died-climbing-mt-ruapehu-was-young-auckland-uni-scientist-wednesday-davis/6SFDKIDVUNB3ZKFZ72FLQKEAHM/ David WilliamsWednesday Davis graduated in 2022 with a Masters in Marine Science and worked at the uni. It’s all about the mindset you choose - Stratford District mayor Neil Volzke https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/its-all-about-the-mindset-you-choose-stratford-district-mayor-neil-volzke/XLWJXWFZQ5FAVCLTE2FGIOHRB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/its-all-about-the-mindset-you-choose-stratford-district-mayor-neil-volzke/XLWJXWFZQ5FAVCLTE2FGIOHRB4/ Neil Volzke, Stratford District Council mayorOPINION: Plenty to be postitive about in Stratford.
